creator: Pocket Box Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Pocket Box is an intelligent mobile app that helps you track all your car, van and motorcycle data and store all your vehicle documents, car service records and policies in one safe secure storage platform. Information about your car, van or motorcycle can be retrieved instantly by entering your vehicle registration.

Most people are not organised and sometimes they mislay car documents and forget to renew important things like tax, insurance and MOT leaving them open to fines and penalties. Pocket Box will make sure you remain road legal by reminding you of those important dates like booking your MOT, renewing your tax and recording your service history. Pocket Box helps you manage your vehicle in a way that will give you complete peace of mind by making sure your car, van or motorcycle is legal and safe.

Buying a used vehicle? Pocket Box allows you to discover any hidden car, motorcycle or van history before you decide to buy a vehicle. The vehicle check data we provide is sourced from several top tier data providers such as The association of British insurers, Police National Computer, VDI Valuations, Experian Automotive, UK Finance companies, VOSA / DVSA and DVLA. We can also back all vehicle history checks with a £40,000 data guarantee to ensure all our customers are protected.

Pocket Box is a modern take on a traditional log book, giving you a new generation digital platform for your service history and maintenance records. Take a photo of the receipt/maintenance record or pick an existing image, PDF or other document and attach it to the vehicle event.

Our mobile app makes it easy to view find car, van, or motorcycle insurance quotes. Search over 115+ different car insurance providers. Pocket Box increases your chance of finding a great deal by searching the market for you.

A full list of our features:

- Mot Status
- Tax Status
- Insurance Information
- Important Date Reminders
- Identification and Vehicle Related Document Storage
- Receipt/Invoice Management
- Task Management
- Vehicle History Checks
- Vehicle Valuation
- Extended Vehicle Data
- OCR Technology for quick and simple identification storage
- Secure Platform
- Car, Van & Motorcycle Insurance Comparison

Buying a used vehicle? Pocket Box allows you to discover any hidden car, motorcycle or van history before you decide to buy a vehicle. The vehicle check data we provide is sourced from several top tier data providers such as The association of British insurers, Police National Computer, VDI Valuations, Experian Automotive, UK Finance companies, VOSA / DVSA and DVLA. We can also back all vehicle history checks with a £40,000 data guarantee to ensure all our customers are protected.

Pocket Box is a modern take on a traditional log book, giving you a new generation digital platform for your service history and maintenance records. Take a photo of the receipt/maintenance record or pick an existing image, PDF or other document and attach it to the vehicle event.

Our mobile app makes it easy to view find car, van, or motorcycle insurance quotes. Search over 115+ different car insurance providers. Pocket Box increases your chance of finding a great deal by searching the market for you.

A full list of our features:

- Mot Status
- Tax Status
- Insurance Information
- Important Date Reminders
- Identification and Vehicle Related Document Storage
- Receipt/Invoice Management
- Task Management
- Vehicle History Checks
- Vehicle Valuation
- Extended Vehicle Data
- OCR Technology for quick and simple identification storage
- Secure Platform
- Car, Van & Motorcycle Insurance Comparison
